name: Simba-TheExplorer
0:
”Alexa, open simba safari.”
”Alexa, ask simba safari to explore India.”
”Alexa, ask simba safari to tell me about Diwali.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simba safari
des:
Young minds learn best when taught in an interactive fashion. Our skill considers these factors and presents a character, Simba, for them to explore countries and learn about festivals with. The skill is targeted towards 3-9-year-old children. The skill is designed in a way that children can learn on their own, or parents can invoke the skill and walk through it with their children.
 
Once the user launches the skill by saying, "Open Simba Safari", he/she can use it in two ways-
1. Interactive mode that helps them learn about festivals.
2. Interactive mode of exploring countries and learning about them.
 
If the user wishes to explore a country, Alexa randomly selects a country for the user to explore or explore one of the user's choice.
If the user wishes to learn about festivals, Alexa randomly selects a festival to learn or starts with one of the user's choice.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
